name: openclaw/openclaw

description: The biggest community resource list for OpenClaw — skills, tools, tutorials, and integrations. 179K+ stars.

description: Curated catalog of 2,999+ OpenClaw skills organized by category — productivity, dev tools, smart home, finance, and more.

description: Crypto and trading-focused OpenClaw skills — DeFi monitoring, portfolio tracking, on-chain analytics.

name: lekt9/unbrowse-openclaw
description: Self-learning API skill generator — reverse-engineers website APIs so OpenClaw can skip browser automation entirely. Up to 100x faster.

name: lekt9/openclaw-foundry
description: Meta-extension that lets OpenClaw write its own skills. Self-improving AI agent toolkit.

name: cloudflare/moltworker
description: Deploy OpenClaw as a serverless AI agent on Cloudflare Workers — edge computing with Durable Objects for persistent state.

description: Home Assistant add-on for OpenClaw — control your smart home with natural language. Lights, climate, locks, routines.

name: essamamdani/openclaw-coolify
description: Self-hosted OpenClaw deployment using Coolify — run your own agent server without cloud dependencies.

name: backslash-security/Claw-Hunter
description: Security detection tool — identifies rogue OpenClaw instances, prompt injection attempts, and unauthorized agent activity.

name: hesamsheikh/awesome-openclaw-usecases
description: Community-curated collection of verified OpenClaw use cases and integrations with setup guides.

name: SamurAIGPT/awesome-openclaw
description: Alternative awesome-list focused on practical tutorials, video walkthroughs, and getting-started guides.

name: intelliot/Awesome-OpenClaw
description: Tips, tricks, and advanced configuration guides — power-user knowledge for getting the most out of OpenClaw.

name: openclaw/clawhub
description: Official skills marketplace source — browse, publish, and discover 5,700+ community-built OpenClaw skills.

name: openclaw/openclaw-docs
